title: Midnight's Nightlings and Starettes
html_content:
This article is still yet to be completed due to stress.

We get a lot of stressful torture in our lives that makes us crash into slumber. Given that inspiration is a big variable, and we may have been lacking of it, this article will be completed as soon as possible, at our own pace... HONEST!


Chris's selfie, posted to verify himself to server member Duff101.

Midnight's Nightlings and Starettes is a Discord server by Midnight Moonflower, meant to support her art and comics.[1] Chris joined in July 2019. The Watchmen group also joined and harassed Midnight and other members over Chris's presence in the server.

Contents

  • 1 Chris's chats
    • 1.1 Chris Joins
    • 1.2 Hit-or-Miss R34
    • 1.3 Is that The Sergeant at Arms?
    • 1.4 Barbara's Trip to the ER
  • 2 Chats about Chris
    • 2.1 Watchmen Raid
    • 2.2 Watchmen Raid, Part 2
    • 2.3 Watchmen Harassment
  • 3 Gallery
  • 4 See also
  • 5 References

Chris's chats

Chris's messages will be represented in blue, while Midnight's will be represented in purple.

Chris Joins

26 July 2019

Chris ChanSonichu1982 has joined. Stay a while and listen!

Duff101
Man this place is quite sparsely populated
RosieLillichu
Yeah if you know anyone who enjoys Midnight's art please let them know about it
Duff101
Wait a rooting tooting second

Is that ChrisChanSonichu1982 as in THE Chris Chan?

RosieLillichu
No prob not

She goes by Christine so her username would reflect that

Chris
Or Probably IS.

Duff101
OH SHIIIIIIT
RosieLillichu
o.o mind blown
Duff101
@RosieLillichu Mate you just got destroyed
RosieLillichu
Damn! You're right Imfao

Christine is full of surprises!

Chris
I'm drawing for BronyCon right now. Have a great and safe day.
Duff101
Coolio
Midnight Moonflower
Glad to see the discord is more active

I am probably going to color my animation short a little then work on the pic of Zero (Midnight's little brother).

RosieLillichu
Yay! Sounds awesome! Can't wait! I'm working on a Sonichu Prince
Midnight Moonflower
Tomorrow and the day after, My husband is teaching me self defense

Because I will be at Bronycon

And the Navy is having him work so he sadly can't come with

RosieLillichu
Oh that sounds cool good luck

And it's important to stay safe

[cutoff]

Midnight Moonflower
Awww

Oh hey Christine online! Hi Christine!

Gallery

Hit-or-Miss R34

30 July 2019

MKR posted two R34 drawings of Transformers and commented:

Dont judge me XD

Chris responded:

I was curious about the twitchy servos in that for a while, but it ended up being hit-or-miss with me.
Gallery

Is that The Sergeant at Arms?

17 September 2019

Chris
I just got the memo of the server.

Hold up a moment: @Thesergeantatarms?

The same guy on YouTube who uploads EVERYTHING there is about me?

[Chris linked to The Sergeant at Arms's YouTube channel]

Yep. I'm willing to wager it is he.
Gallery

Barbara's Trip to the ER

19 October 2019

Midnight Moonflower
So how have you been doing lately? I am trying to heal up from a sore throat. My runny nose is gone thankfully
Chris
I'm faring okay. I've been feeling a LOT of psychic senses going off and on all day today while being out on errand and grocery shopping. Also, my mom had a bit of high blood pressure and asked me to drive her to the ER; they found nothing wrong with her It is likely a combination of stress and the incoming magic energies from C-197.
Midnight Moonflower
I'm sorry to hear that your mom isn't doing so well. On October 26th to 30th Angel and I get to see my parents. Also get to see my sister on the 29th. Also thinking of different ideas for comics and stuff. I kind of have Angel's luck when it comes to shinies and other rare things in games.

I might get a tattoo of where my wings will be on my back. Not right away but when I have the money

Chris
That would be cool for when you wear a tank top or a swimsuit.
Gallery

Chats about Chris

NOTE: Chris was not directly involved in this conversation.

Watchmen Raid

Unknown date

The Watchmen raid Midnight's Discord server to harass and intimidate her and other members over Chris being a member of the server. Watchmen members Naught, MKR and AquaDiamond8; and Midnight's friend Lilli are present in the conversation.

Naught
friendly reminder null marvin the captain and others have access to cwes social media..so if you think ur communications are private theyre not.
Lilli
It's funny how people come here expecting this to have anything to do with Christine
MKR
Christine is in the server
Lilli
She barely shows up
MKR
Yeah, but other people don't know.
Naught
doesnt matter
Lilli
No one is trying to bother her so like why don't we all just let this out and stop playing around it's getting really annoying tbh
Lilli
Like how everyone shows up when I mention Christine
MKR
I don't understand
Naught
no one is playing
Lilli
Sorry I'm just tired of people acting nice when no one here is trying to bother Christine well I mean like maybe some people are but Midnight isn't
Naught
you dont understand the situation
Lilli
That's the only one I can vouch for
Naught
namáº¹ em
Naught
than you all get doxed
Naught
guilt by association
Lilli
What? You're going to doxx ya?
Lilli
*us
Lilli
Or just me and Midnight?
Naught
no
Naught
im telling you what will happen
Naught
not by me thats how it goes
Lilli
Okay I understand that thanks
Naught
believe it or not im one of the less mean ones
Naught
Lilli
Oh really? So then let's get this all out on the table then, what do you like want? What's your deal? When people start arguing you show up
Naught
i curb weens and alogs
Lilli
Okay

Alright so like we barely talk about Christine here I'm barely in here

She never shows up here

Naught
dont be pedantic
Lilli
Lmfao
Naught
youre gonna end up with a cwcki page and on kiwi farms if you dont cease your faggotry
Lilli
You're threatening to "curb" me and you expect me to not have evidence for my innocence?

Okay thanks for the pro tip

Lilli
So like you guys see all that? You understand I know what's at stake? Why do you think I'm not in any servers and why I don't rp or engage in that kinda shit? I'm not interested in anything but spreading a little fucking kindness? This isn't directed at anyone specifically it's directed at the ones who are taking notes
AquaDiamond8
its still directect at someone specifically

im lowkjey surprised i havent been kicked yet

Gallery

Watchmen Raid, Part 2

Unknown date

Midnight protests against the treatment towards herself and her friends.

Midnight Moonflower
I decided to come back for a bit. @yugiohroxmehsox @Aqua I would like to talk
Midnight Moonflower
I thought you 2 knew that I am close to Christine to be her friend. Also this is not a Sonichu/CWC server. It's my server supporting my art and comics. Yes Christine is on this server but this is because she's my friend. She is barely active on this server. Also Pokegeek is my best friend who isn't Pri not some ween. One of your friends mentioned that she would get doxed. You put @Darth PornRobes's face in one of your pictures without her permission and accused her of being a kiwi membership. That XIII guy thought I stole Christine's wallet on her visit! Her wallet wasn't even there when she came in and she found it at the police station! None of my friends are weens. I don't know why you think I am like Jacob Sockness but if I have to prove my innocence I will! I am not going to hide and watch this anymore! And I will take screenshots of you think about taking screenshots and flipping what I just said I am going to make this a civil talk and ask why you all are doing this on my server?
MKR
Bismuth thought you were all weens.
Midnight Moonflower
That's fine you don't have to get along with all my friends.
MKR
I will say one thing before leaving this server as I feel that's the natural consequence. If you truly want to be friends with Chris, it's very important for you to grow a thicker skin. Get tough or the trolls, weens, farms and internet will eat you alive. People have committed suicide over this before. So please for your sake get tough and learn to take criticism, constructive and otherwise.
Midnight Moonflower
I mean I don't get along with Jacob Sockness or Sarah and Steve
MKR
They are out of the picture

I take my role in things very seriously, its actually made me a stronger person overall.

Gallery

Watchmen Harassment

2 January 2020

The Watchman XIII claims to be in an affair with a server member (identity redacted).

XIII
[REDACTED] thanks for the selfie I promise I won't tell your husband. [heart emote] you

[XIII uploads a selfie of the server member]

The member asks XIII and other Watchmen what is going on, insisting she is not cheating.

[REDACTED]
Can you guys explain this shit? I am not cheating on [REDACTED]
